text: The fact is, I am in my third marriage and I do not believe in divorce. But I was half the problem, I guarantee you. More than half the problem. I couldn't negotiate with the other women.
author: James Brolin

text: Only after I faced the unhappiness of my first marriage did I start on the path of personal growth.
author: Judith Wright

text: I hope gay marriage will be legal in every state.
author: Mark Consuelos

text: The activists will not stop in trying to impose their extreme views on the rest of us, and they have now plotted out a state-by-state strategy to increase the number of judicial decisions redefining marriage without the voice of the people being heard.
author: Jim Bunning

text: The very idea of marriage is basic to recognition as equals in our society any status short of that is inferior, unjust, and unconstitutional.
author: Ted Olson
